title: Authors and Citation
text: Tadhg Moore. Author, maintainer. Chris McBride. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Moore T, McBride C (2024). bathytools: Tools handle bathymetric data. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://limnotrack.github.io/bathytools/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {bathytools: Tools to handle bathymetric data},   author = {Tadhg Moore and Chris McBride},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://limnotrack.github.io/bathytools/}, }

title: Tools to handle bathymetric data
text: goal bathytools facilitate generation bathymetric data lakes reservoirs. package provides functions generate depth points bathymetric data, rasterise points bathymetric raster. package designed work data AEME project, can used bathymetric data.

title: Tools to handle bathymetric data
text: can install development version bathytools GitHub :

title: Tools to handle bathymetric data
text: basic example shows generate bathymetric raster shoreline depth points:
code: library(bathytools) ## basic example code shoreline <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_shoreline.rds",                                  package = "bathytools")) point_data <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/depth_points.rds",                                   package = "bathytools")) bathy <- rasterise_bathy(shoreline = shoreline, point_data = point_data,                          crs = 2193) #> Generating depth points... [2024-09-17 19:25:24] #> Finished! [2024-09-17 19:25:24] #> Interpolating to raster... [2024-09-17 19:25:24] #> Finished! [2024-09-17 19:25:50]

what: Convert bathymetry raster to hypsograph — bathy_to_hypso
title: Convert bathymetry raster to hypsograph — bathy_to_hypso
text: function converts bathymetry raster hypsograph, data.frame area lake different depths. function takes bathymetry raster input returns data frame depth area depth.

title: Convert bathymetry raster to hypsograph — bathy_to_hypso
Convert bathymetry raster to hypsograph — bathy_to_hypso
text: bathy_raster SpatRaster object bathymetry data. surface numeric. surface elevation lake. Default 0. depths numeric. depths calculate area. single numeric value provided, function calculate area depth surface minimum depth bathymetry raster intervals provided value. vector numeric values provided, function calculate area depth specified vector. Default 1.

title: Convert bathymetry raster to hypsograph — bathy_to_hypso
text: data.frame

title: Convert bathymetry raster to hypsograph — bathy_to_hypso
code: shoreline <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_shoreline.rds", package = "bathytools")) point_data <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/depth_points.rds", package = "bathytools")) bathy_raster <- rasterise_bathy(shoreline = shoreline, point_data = point_data, crs = 2193) #> Generating depth points... [2024-09-18 03:01:06] #> Finished! [2024-09-18 03:01:07] #> Interpolating to raster... [2024-09-18 03:01:07] #> Adjusting depths >= 0 #> Finished! [2024-09-18 03:01:29]  hyps <- bathy_to_hypso(bathy_raster = bathy_raster)

what: Generate depth points for interpolation — generate_depth_points
title: Generate depth points for interpolation — generate_depth_points
text: Generate depth points interpolation

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — generate_depth_points
code: generate_depth_points(   shoreline,   islands = NULL,   point_data = NULL,   contours = NULL,   res = 2,   subsample = TRUE,   crs = NULL )

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — generate_depth_points
text: shoreline sf object lake shoreline. islands sf object lake islands present. point_data sf object depth points. Must contain "depth" column. NULL, contours must provided. contours sf object depth contours. NULL, points must provided. res numeric resolution output raster metres. subsample logical subsample points 10000 TRUE. Default TRUE. crs target coordinate reference system: object class crs, input string st_crs

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — generate_depth_points
text: sf object depth points.

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — generate_depth_points
code: shoreline <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_shoreline.rds", package = "bathytools")) point_data <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/depth_points.rds", package = "bathytools"))  # Generate depth points with points ---- depth_points <- generate_depth_points(shoreline = shoreline, point_data = point_data) #> Generating depth points... what: Get lake surface elevation from DEM — get_lake_surface_elevation
title: Get lake surface elevation from DEM — get_lake_surface_elevation
text: Get lake surface elevation DEM

title: Get lake surface elevation from DEM — get_lake_surface_elevation
Get lake surface elevation from DEM — get_lake_surface_elevation
text: dem_raster SpatRaster object DEM data. shoreline sf object lake shoreline.

title: Get lake surface elevation from DEM — get_lake_surface_elevation
text: numeric

title: Get lake surface elevation from DEM — get_lake_surface_elevation
code: shoreline <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_shoreline.rds", package = "bathytools")) dem_raster <- terra::rast(system.file("extdata/dem_32m.tif", package = "bathytools")) lake_elev <- get_lake_surface_elevation(dem_raster = dem_raster, shoreline = shoreline) #> Lake surface elevation from DEM: 313.3 m

what: Interpolate point depth data to a raster — interpolate_points
title: Interpolate point depth data to a raster — interpolate_points
text: Interpolate point depth data raster

title: Interpolate point depth data to a raster — interpolate_points
code: interpolate_points(   point_data,   shoreline,   crs,   res = 2,   method = "MBA",   n = 1,   m = 1,   h = 8,   print_plot = TRUE )

title: Interpolate point depth data to a raster — interpolate_points
text: point_data sf object depth points. Must contain "depth" column. NULL, contours must provided. shoreline sf object lake shoreline. crs target coordinate reference system: object class crs, input string st_crs res numeric resolution output raster metres. method character interpolation method. Options 'MBA' (default). n initial size spline space hierarchical     construction along x axis. rectangular domain     square, n = m = 1 recommended. x axis k times length     y axis, n = 1, m = k recommended. default n = 1. m initial size spline space hierarchical     construction along y axis. y axis k times length     x axis, m = 1, n = k recommended. default m = 1. h Number levels hierarchical construction. , e.g.,     n = m = 1 h = 8, resulting spline surface coefficient     grid size \(2^h\) + 3 = 259 direction     spline surface. See references additional information. print_plot logical print plot interpolated raster.

title: Interpolate point depth data to a raster — interpolate_points
text: SpatRaster

title: Interpolate point depth data to a raster — interpolate_points
code: shoreline <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_shoreline.rds", package = "bathytools")) point_data <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/depth_points.rds",                                   package = "bathytools")) depth_points <- generate_depth_points(shoreline = shoreline, point_data = point_data) #> Generating depth points... [2024-09-18 03:01:41] #> Finished! [2024-09-18 03:01:41] bathy <- interpolate_points(point_data = depth_points, shoreline = shoreline, crs = 2193) #> Interpolating to raster... [2024-09-18 03:01:41] #> Adjusting depths >= 0 #> Finished! [2024-09-18 03:01:59]

what: Merge lake bathymetry raster with a DEM raster — merge_bathy_dem
title: Merge lake bathymetry raster with a DEM raster — merge_bathy_dem
text: Merge lake bathymetry raster DEM raster

title: Merge lake bathymetry raster with a DEM raster — merge_bathy_dem
code: merge_bathy_dem(   shoreline,   bathy_raster,   dem_raster,   transform_shoreline = TRUE,   catchment = NULL,   crop_dem_to_catchment = TRUE )

title: Merge lake bathymetry raster with a DEM raster — merge_bathy_dem
text: shoreline sf object lake shoreline. bathy_raster SpatRaster object bathymetry data. dem_raster SpatRaster object DEM data. transform_shoreline logical. TRUE, shoreline transformed match CRS DEM raster. catchment sf object catchment boundary. provided, DEM raster cropped catchment boundary. crop_dem_to_catchment logical. TRUE, DEM raster cropped catchment boundary. Requires catchment provided.

title: Merge lake bathymetry raster with a DEM raster — merge_bathy_dem
text: SpatRaster object merged bathymetry DEM data.

title: Merge lake bathymetry raster with a DEM raster — merge_bathy_dem
code: shoreline <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_shoreline.rds", package = "bathytools")) catchment <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_catchment.rds",                                  package = "bathytools")) point_data <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/depth_points.rds", package = "bathytools")) bathy_raster <- rasterise_bathy(shoreline = shoreline, point_data = point_data, crs = 2193) #> Generating depth points... [2024-09-18 03:01:59] #> Finished! [2024-09-18 03:02:00] #> Interpolating to raster... [2024-09-18 03:02:00] #> Adjusting depths >= 0 #> Finished! [2024-09-18 03:02:20]  dem_raster <- terra::rast(system.file("extdata/dem_32m.tif", package = "bathytools")) dem_bath <- merge_bathy_dem(shoreline = shoreline, bathy_raster = bathy_raster, dem_raster = dem_raster, catchment = catchment) #> Warning: Resolutions of bathy_raster [2, 2] and dem_raster [32, 32] do notmatch. Resampling bathy_raster to match dem_raster #> Lake surface elevation from DEM: 313.3 m

what: Generate depth points for interpolation — rasterise_bathy
title: Generate depth points for interpolation — rasterise_bathy
text: Generate depth points interpolation

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — rasterise_bathy
code: rasterise_bathy(   shoreline,   islands = NULL,   point_data = NULL,   contours = NULL,   res = 2,   subsample = TRUE,   crs,   method = "MBA",   print_plot = TRUE,   n = 1,   m = 1,   h = 8 )

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — rasterise_bathy
text: shoreline sf object lake shoreline. islands sf object lake islands present. point_data sf object depth points. Must contain "depth" column. NULL, contours must provided. contours sf object depth contours. NULL, points must provided. res numeric resolution output raster metres. subsample logical subsample points 10000 TRUE. Default TRUE. crs target coordinate reference system: object class crs, input string st_crs method character interpolation method. Options 'MBA' (default), print_plot logical print plot interpolated raster. n initial size spline space hierarchical     construction along x axis. rectangular domain     square, n = m = 1 recommended. x axis k times length     y axis, n = 1, m = k recommended. default n = 1. m initial size spline space hierarchical     construction along y axis. y axis k times length     x axis, m = 1, n = k recommended. default m = 1. h Number levels hierarchical construction. , e.g.,     n = m = 1 h = 8, resulting spline surface coefficient     grid size \(2^h\) + 3 = 259 direction     spline surface. See references additional information.

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — rasterise_bathy
text: sf object depth points.

title: Generate depth points for interpolation — rasterise_bathy
code: shoreline <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/rotoma_shoreline.rds", package = "bathytools")) point_data <- readRDS(system.file("extdata/depth_points.rds", package = "bathytools")) bathy <- rasterise_bathy(shoreline = shoreline, point_data = point_data, crs = 2193) #> Generating depth points... text: dem_bath SpatRaster object merged DEM bathymetry data. Can generated using merge_bathy_dem function. lake_elev numeric, elevation lake surface. Can extracted using get_lake_surface_elevation function. ext_elev numeric, additional elevation extend lake surface. allows generate flood map. Default 0.
